Detailed Description

<For compatibility between QWidgets++ for Photon 1.14 and QWidgets++ for Photon 2.0, the class CScrollContainer is used for PtScrollContainer in Photon 2.0 and PtScrollArea in Photon 1.14

Creates a scroll area widget. If virtualWidth/Height are given (nonzero), the scroll area is set to this virtual size. If increments are given (nonzero), they are set

Scrollbar scrolls automatically to keep the currently focused widget visible.
